p: In the case of sunflower oil, high oleic acid and low linoleic acid content is also a highly valuable property. Such oil is characterized by a higher degree of oxidative stability, which makes it more suitable for frying, refining, and storage [ 14, 15]. A new promising sunflower oil type is sunflower oil with high oleic content coupled with high stearic acid content. The oil of such type is very stable to oxidation and can serve as a healthy alternative to the palm oil due to its specific properties [ 16].
